org.apache.solr.search.function
Class FloatFieldSource

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.solr.search.function.ValueSource
      org.apache.solr.search.function.FieldCacheSource
          org.apache.solr.search.function.FloatFieldSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FloatFieldSource
extends FieldCacheSource

Obtains float field values from the FieldCache using getFloats() and makes those values available as other numeric types, casting as needed.

Version:
$Id: FloatFieldSource.java 816202 2009-09-17 14:08:13Z yonik $
